text: A Reliance retail at Guntur. Reliance Fresh is the convenience store format which forms part of the retail business of Reliance Industries of India under its subsidiary Reliance Retail Limited. In 2007, Reliance stores in Jharkhand faced the ire of mobs of local vegetable vendors. They vandalised and attacked the stores claiming that they were stealing their livelihoods. == See also == *Reliance Industries *List of Indian companies * Namdhari's Fresh == References == == External links == * Reliance Official Site * Podbharti's podcast reporting on the stone pelting incident at Reliance Fresh store at Ranchi.
